name: Broken World
storyline: In Broken World, the planet has been thrown into chaos after a recent cataclysmic event. What was once a Pangaea-like super continent has been broken apart into 4 different islands. It is the player's goal to unite all these islands back together by lighting 4 beacons of Celestial Power - The Fire Monuments.
summary: An Action Adventure RPG where the player explores 4 different islands to light 4 different beacons of power - The Fire Monuments. While exploring these areas, the player will encounter puzzles, combat challenges, and will have to use their different abilities to reach the end.
